title: Hawks' PR Problems Focus Attention On Race In NBA, Atlanta Sports
teaser: NBA Hawks owner Bruce Levenson's decision to quit this week over a racially offensive email has reopened a conversation about the racial divide among fans in sports. Audie Cornish talks to sports reporter and blogger Nubyjas Wilborn.
